text:
when webapp module is used with apache 2.0 
it shows on info page wrong server port ( 20480 (0x5000) instead 80 (0x50) )

my quick look >
it seems that apr_socaddr_port_get() do htons() by itself,
so mod_webapp.c do extra htons() in wam_invoke()

webapp module was taken from cvs on 11.09
creator: lvv@octet.spb.ru
pier@betaversion.org
text: I am investigating this bug. Assigning it to self.
This will be addressed after Tomcat 4.0 final will be released. Currently the Apache 2.0 part is _very_ experimental.
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text: This will be addressed after Tomcat 4.0 final will be released. Currently the Apache 2.0 part is _very_ experimental.
